dcterms:creator: Hui Su
Xiaoyu Shen
Rongzhi Zhang
Fei Sun
Pengwei Hu
Cheng Niu
Jie Zhou
dcterms:description: The REWRITE dataset is used for dialogue utterance rewriting, where the task is to reconstruct the latest dialogue utterance by copying the missing content from the dialogue context. All instances in this dataset require rewriting.
dcterms:title: REWRITE

dcterms:creator: Zhufeng Pan
Kun Bai
Yan Wang
Lianqiang Zhou
Xiaojiang Liu
dcterms:description: The RESTORATION dataset is designed for improving open-domain dialogue systems via multi-turn incomplete utterance restoration. It contains instances where around 40% do not require any changes for rewriting.
dcterms:title: RESTORATION
